Comment: Why are so many people still on Twitter?
Author: iKangaeru

Comment: The Tesla brand is largely wrecked in the long run. While a few filthy rich MAGA bozos may buy them just to show solidarity with autocracy, most Trump supporters are not the EV type and cannot make up for the international decline in sales.   I'm all for local demonstrations – but at the home state and district offices of GOP senators and House members.   A peaceful but colorful demonstration with 100 people outside (for example) the La Crosse office of Rep. Derrick Van Orden (R-WI-03) is worth 100,000 emails which just go into his spam folder and nobody ends up seeing.

Comment: Not so funny now, is it, funny man….

Comment: As long as it was peaceful, I'm cool with it. Don't wanna see President Rodent disappear more people just because they tapped a Tesla's Mirror.
